name: Adastra 3D
description:
I am not affiliated with Team Echo Project

Adastra 3D is a recreation of the furry visual novel Adastra in Unreal Engine 4.26.

Adastra 3D currently includes:

  • Amicus's room
  • Amicus's bathroom
  • The garden
  • The bathhouse
  • VR support (download the correct version)
  • VN Mode a mode where you can write and read scenes from Adastra

Credits:

  • Adastra by: Team Echo Project
  • Adastra 3D by: NikoFurry
  • Adastra 3D Logo by: Marcy
